329:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ suprabhānmahānagarānniṣkramya muhūrtaṃ mārgamanusṛtya mahāprabhasya rājño'nuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
329:11: tamacintyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattvakāryanidhyānālokanayamadhimucyamānaḥ pratilebhe cittaprītiprasādavegaṃ cittapraharṣaṃ cittotplavaṃ cittanandīṃ cittānāvilatāṃ cittaprabhāsvaratāṃ cittadṛḍhatāṃ cittavipulatāṃ cittāparyādanatām|
329:12: sa evaṃ kalyāṇamitrānusmṛtimanasikāraprayukto'śrūṇi pravartayan anuvicintayāmāsa-aho batedaṃ kalyāṇamitradarśanaṃ sarvaguṇaratnākarabhūtaṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanaparipūraṇaṃ sarvabodhisattvasmṛtiviśuddhikaraṃ sarvabodhisattvadhāraṇīmaṇḍalapariśodhanaṃ sarvabodhisattvasamādhyālokasaṃjananaṃ sarvabuddhadarśanapratilābhasaṃbhāvanaṃ sarvabuddhadharmameghasaṃpravarṣaṇaṃ sarvabodhisattvapraṇidhinayasūcanamacintyaprajñājñānālokasaṃjananaṃ dṛḍhabodhisattvendriyāṅkuravivardhanam|
329:24: tasyaivaṃ rudataḥ krandataḥ paridevamānasya gagatalagatā devagaṇāḥ sadānubaddhāśca saṃcodakā buddhadūtā bodhisattvadevatā evamāhu-kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisattvasya buddhā bhagavanto'bhirādhitacittā bhavanti|
329:31: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastataḥ samādhijñānālokād vyutthāya anupūrveṇa yena sthirā rājadhānī tenopasaṃkramya acalāmupāsikāṃ parimārgati parigaveṣate|
329:32: tasya mahājanakāya upadarśayati-eṣā kulaputra acalopāsikā svaniveśane mātāpitṛsabhāginī kumārabhūtā svajñātigaṇaparivṛtā mahato janakāyasya dharmaṃ deśayati||
329:33: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprītiprasādaprāmodyaparisphuṭacetā yena acalāyā upāsikāyā niveśanaṃ tenopajagāma|
329:34: upetya acalāyā upāsikāyā niveśanadvāre sthito'paśyat sarvaṃ taṃ niveśanaṃ suvarṇavarṇayā ābhayā sphuṭamavabhāsitaṃ kāyacittaprahlādinyā|
329:35: samanantaraspṛṣṭasya ca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya tayā prabhayā,
329:36: sarvavedayitaiśvaryadhvajasamādhipramukhāni śāntipradeśasamādhipramukhāni sarvajagaddhitasamādhipramukhāni samantacakṣurupekṣāvatīsamādhipramukhāni tathāgatakośasamādhipramukhāni pañcamātrāṇi samādhimukhaśatānyavakrāntāni saṃbhūtāni sūkṣmāṇi mṛdūni|
329:39: tathārūpaṃ ca gandhamajighrat yo na devānāṃ na devakanyānāṃ na nāgānāṃ na nāgakanyānāṃ na yakṣāṇāṃ na yakṣakanyānāṃ na gandharvāṇāṃ na gandharvakanyānāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ nāsurakanyānāṃ na garuḍānāṃ na garūḍakanyānāṃ na kinnarāṇāṃ na kinnarakanyānāṃ na mahoragāṇāṃ na mahoragakanyānāṃ na manuṣyāṇāṃ na manuṣyakanyānām|
329:40: na sā strī daśadiśi loke saṃvidyate,
329:43: na sa varṇāvabhāso'sti daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgatavarṇāvabhāsam,
329:47: nāsti tadātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānaṃ daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgatātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānam,
329:51: nāsti sa prabhāvyūho daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataprabhāvyūham,
329:55: nāsti sa gandho daśadiśi loke devabhavaneṣu vā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhavaneṣu vā yastasyā mukhakośavisṛtagandhena samaḥ,
329:57: nāsti sa bhavanavyūhaparibhogo daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataparibhogam,
329:61: nāsti sā parivārasaṃpat daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataparivārasaṃpadam,
329:65: na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yaḥ samartho'calāmupāsikāṃ rāgacittena prekṣitum|
329:66: na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yaḥ acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sahadarśanena kleśo na vyupaśamaṃ gacchet|
329:67: tadyathāpi nāma daśa śatasahasravaśavartino mahābrahmāṇaḥ kāmāvacarāḥ kleśānna samudācaranti,
329:68: evameva sahadarśanena acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sattvānāṃ kleśā na samudācaranti|
329:69: na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yo acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sahadarśanena tṛptimāpadyeta sthāpayitvā prajñātṛptān||
329:70: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo'calāyā upāsikāyā acintyāṃ kāyādhipateyatām,
329:72: acintyaṃ ca sarvakṣititalanagaramahāparvatāpratihataṃ raśmijālavyūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā acintyaṃ sattvārthakaraṇaṃ ca sarvaromakūpavisṛtaṃ gandhamāghrāya aparyantāṃ ca parivārasaṃpadamavalokya asaṃhāryaṃ ca bhavanavimānavyūhasaṃpadamudvīkṣya aparimāṇāṃśca guṇasamudrānavagāhya acalāmupāsikāmanayā gāthayā abhyaṣṭauṣīt—
329:77: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'calāmupāsikāmanayā gāthayā abhiṣṭutya evamāhamayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam|
329:78: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
329:80: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti|
329:81: tadvadatu me āryā-kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
329:83: atha khalvacalopāsikā snigdhayā bodhisattvavācā manojñayā premaṇīyayā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ pratisaṃmodya evamāha-sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
329:92: āha-ka etasya ārye duryodhanajñānagarbhasya bodhisattvavimokṣamukhasya viṣayaḥ,
329:93: dṛḍhasamādānabodhisattvacaryāmukhasya ca sarvadharmasamatābhūmidhāraṇamukhasya ca sarvadharmatattvodyotanapratibhānālokamukhasya ca dharmaparyeṣṭyaparikhedavyūhasamādhimukhasya ca viṣayaḥ?
329:96: buddhānubhāvena kalyāṇamitraparigraheṇa ca adhimokṣye avatariṣyāmi vijñāsyāmi vicārayiṣyāmi anusariṣyāmi nidhyāsyāmi upanidhyāsyāmi pratyavekṣiṣye vibhāvayiṣyāmi,
329:101: atha khalu acalopāsikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha-bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra,
329:102: atīte'dhvani vimalaprabhe kalpe pralambabāhurnāma tathāgato loke udapādi|
329:103: ahaṃ ca rājño vidyuddattasyaikā duhitā abhūvam|
329:104: tayā me rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ pihiteṣu rājapuradvāreṣu,
329:109: śayanatalagatayā gaganatalagatāṃ jyotirgaṇavatīṃ rajanīṃ prekṣantyā uparyantarikṣe sa bhagavān pralambabāhustathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sumeruriva acalendrānekadevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragaparivāro'cintyāsaṃkhyeyabodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sarvadigapratihataraśmijālaspharaṇakāyo dṛṣṭaḥ|
329:110: tasya ca tathāgatasya sarvaromavivarebhyastathārūpo gandhaḥ pravāti,
329:112: śayanatalādutthāya daśanakhakṛtakarapuṭāñjalirdharaṇitalapratiṣṭhitā taṃ bhagavantaṃ pralambabāhuṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ namaskṛtvā mūrdhnā namasya avalokayamānā paryantaṃ nādhigacchāmi|
329:115: tasyā mama kulaputra etadabhavat-kīdṛśaṃ karma kṛtvā iyamīdṛśī kāyasaṃpat pratilabhyate?
329:125: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān pralambabāhustathāgato mamādhyāṃśayaṃ viditvā evamāha-duryodhanacittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya|
329:137: sāhaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavataḥ pralambabāhostathāgasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādimāni evaṃrūpāṇi dharmanayānuśāsanīmukhāni śrutvā sarvajñajñānamabhikāṅkṣamāṇā daśabalabhāvamabhiprārthayamānā buddhasarasvatīmabhilaṣantī buddhaprabhāvyūhaṃ pariśodhayitukāmā buddhaśarīrasaṃpadaṃ pariniṣpādayitukāmā buddhalakṣaṇānuvyañjanaviśuddhimabhikāṅkṣamāṇā buddhaparṣanmaṇḍalasaṃpadamabhiprārthayamānā buddhakṣetraviśuddhimabhilaṣantī buddheryāpathasaṃpadamabhikāṅkṣamāṇā buddhāyuḥpramāṇasaṃpadamabhinandantī sarvakleśasarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhābhedyacittamutpādaditavatī duryodhanavajramiva sarvaparvatāyudhabalaiḥ|
329:138: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya etena cittotpādena jambudvīpaḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairapi kāmān paribhoktum,
329:140: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya ekapratighacittamutpādayituṃ svabāndhaveṣu,
329:149: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya sarvatathāgatadharmameghān saṃpratīcchamānā ekadharmapadavyañjanamapi manasā vismartum,
329:152: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvato dharmasāgarān pibantī ekapadamapyanidhyātamavilokitam,
329:154: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ dharmanayasāgarāṇāmekadharmanayadvāramapi yatra mayā na samādhirabhinirhṛtaḥ,
329:156: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmacakraṃ saṃdhārayamāṇā yathāsaṃdhāritādekapadavyañjanamapyanusraṣṭam,
329:158: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ buddhadarśanasamudrāṇāmekapraṇidhānamapi yanmayā na sarvasattvasāgaraviśuddhaye'bhinirhṛtam,
329:162: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya ekasattvamapi cakṣuravabhāsamāgataṃ yo mayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na samādāpitaḥ|
329:164: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairekapadavyañjane'pi saṃśayamutpādayituṃ dvayasaṃjñāṃ vā vikalpasaṃjñāṃ vā nānātvasaṃjñāṃ vā agrahasaṃjñāṃ vā hīnapraṇītasaṃjñāṃ vā anunayapratighasaṃjñāṃ vā utpādayitum||
329:165: sāhaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādavirahitā abhūvaṃ buddhotpādaiḥ|
329:180: etaṃ ca me kulaputra duryodhanajñānagarbhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣasukham,
329:188: atha khalu acalopāsikā yathāniṣaṇṇaiva duryodhanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣamukhapūrvaṃgamāni sarvadharmaparyeṣṭyaparikhedavyūhasamādhimukhapūrvaṃgamāni amoghamaṇḍalavyūhasamādhimukhapūrvaṃgamāni daśabalajñānamaṇḍalābhimukhasamādhimukhapūrvaṃgamāni buddhavaṃśākṣayakośasamādhivimokṣamukhapūrvaṃgamāni ca daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi vyavalokayati anuvicārayati anusarati nidhyapayati|
329:190: apaśyat sudhanaḥ śreiṣṭhidārako daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyaparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampamānān,
329:192: ekaikasmiṃśca lokadhātau koṭīśate cāturmahādvīpakānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ koṭīśataṃ tathāgatānāmapaśyat|
329:197: ekaisya ca tathāgatasya sarvadharmacakrodyotanaṃ sarvasattvaśrotravijñapanaṃ svaramaṇḍalamaśrauṣīt||
329:198: atha khalvacalopāsikā tataḥ samādhervyutthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha-dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra,
329:203: dṛḍhasamādānāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāmanuśikṣamāṇā sarvadharmaparyeṣṭyaparikhedavyūhasamādhisamāpannā duryodhanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣamukhapratiṣṭhitā sarvadharmasamatābhūmidhāraṇyanugamena sarvadharmatalodyotanapratibhānajñānālokakauśalyena sarvasattvān subhāṣitena saṃtoṣayāmi|
329:204: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāprameyaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum?
329:206: ye te mahāgaruḍendrā iva sattvasāgaramavagāhante paripakvabodhisattvoddharaṇatāyai|
329:207: ye te vaṇija iva sarvajñatāratnadvīpe'nuvicaranti daśabalajñānaratnābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ|
329:208: ye te balavatkaivartā iva saṃsārasāgare'nuvicaranti ruciradharmacakramaṇḍalajālahastāḥ tṛṣṇodbhavasattvaparipācanābhyuddharaṇatāyai|
329:209: ye te'surendrā iva tribhuvanapuraṃ spharitvā vicaranti kleśāsurasaṃkṣobhodvṛttasaṃśamanatāyai|
329:210: ye te dinakaramaṇḍalamiva dharmadhātugaganatale samudāgacchanti sattvatṛṣṇāsalilakleśapaṅkocchoṣaṇatāyai|
329:214: ye te cakravartina iva loke vicaranti catuḥsaṃgrahavastupariṣkāropakaraṇasarvajagatsaṃgrahaṇatāyai|
329:216: ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe'mitatosale janapade tosalaṃ nāma nagaram|
329:220: atha khalu sughanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako'calāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya acalāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya acalāyā upāsikāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ|| 20||
